channel.title: Hybrid pvp v3 webclient
channel.description: Well i tried making hybrid pvp v3 client into a webclient i followed everything i changed the auto cache downloader the connecting to file server download located in client.java i made sure i change the findcachedir from signlink.java and i went again to client.java and found something kinda like this c:/hybridpvpcache/gzip i changed it to c:/myservername/gzip but heres the problem it makes the folder in my c disk correctly and downloads the cache correctly but wen it tries to unzip it, it gets an error and goes to connecting in 5 4 3 2 1

item.title: Hybrid pvp v3 webclient
item.dc:creator: @Dextrell Dextrell
item.description:
@Dextrell wrote:

Well i tried making hybrid pvp v3 client into a webclient i followed everything i changed the auto cache downloader the connecting to file server download located in client.java i made sure i change the findcachedir from signlink.java and i went again to client.java and found something kinda like this c:/hybridpvpcache/gzip i changed it to c:/myservername/gzip but heres the problem it makes the folder in my c disk correctly and downloads the cache correctly but wen it tries to unzip it, it gets an error and goes to connecting in 5 4 3 2 1

Read full topic
